value.title: Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures)
value.excerpt: Everyone tells you that you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI. Not so fast! Patrick shows you how you can use quick measures, like year over year, with a quick measure and no date table! value.title: Scope report design requirements
value.excerpt: Gathering appropriate inputs to scope your report design requirements involves identifying your audience, determining the suitable report types, and defining their interface and experience requirements. This module provides you with a strong foundation on which to learn how to plan your report design requirements.
